entry.content: The third alpha version is finally available, fixing several bugs, and enhancing the Java library.
entry.title: Third alpha version

entry.content: The new release, namely 2.0-alpha2, is mainly a bugfix relase, fixing the following issues:
entry.title: Alpha2

entry.content: A new alpha version has been released, fixing several blocking / annoying bugs.
entry.title: New alpha version

entry.content: The project is finally re-open-sourced. Well, at least partially: the code for the compiler and associated tools, as well as libraries is available. The code for the runtime support library is not yet, but will follow once cleaned. Put otherwise, the part of the project written in OCaml is fully available, while the part written in Java remains closed. As it is nevertheless quite a big step forward, the version has changed from early-access to alpha.
entry.title: About alpha(s)

entry.content: This site is replacing the previous one, hosted on x9c.fr. The code repository is published on github.com, where issues can be reported.
entry.title: The site is online

entry.content: For quite a long time, the project was only available as a binary distribution. Now that the code is in better shape, its sources are available.
entry.title: The project is going alpha
